description: Test format=template output + unicode characters (#988, skip postgres)

subjects.name: template-002-asc-order-named-args
subjects.contents:
{{#ask:[[Category:template-002]]<q>[[Has page property:一二三]] OR [[Has page property::456]]</q>
 |?Has page property
 |format=template
 |order=asc
 |sep=;
 |link=none
 |limit=10
 |userparam=[$%&*==42]
 |template=TemplateOutputUsingNamedArgumentsForUnicodeIncludedSubject
 ||named args=yes
}}

subjects.name: template-002-desc-order-named-args
subjects.contents:
{{#ask:[[Category:template-002]]<q>[[Has page property:一二三]] OR [[Has page property::456]]</q>
 |?Has page property
 |format=template
 |order=desc
 |sep=;
 |link=none
 |limit=10
 |userparam=[$%&*==42]
 |template=TemplateOutputUsingNamedArgumentsForUnicodeIncludedSubject
 ||named args=yes
}}

format-testcases.about: #0 asc output order, without further links
format-testcases.subject: template-002-asc-order-named-args

format-testcases.about: #1 desc output order, without further links
format-testcases.subject: template-002-desc-order-named-args

skip-on.postgres: Unicode needs special treatment in postgres
